opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Caspari, Superintendent, Missouri Eastern Correctional Center v. Bohlen

opinion:
510 U.S. 806

Caspari, Superintendent, Missouri Eastern Correctional Center, et al.
v.
Bohlen.

No. 92-1500.

Supreme Court of United States.

October 4, 1993.

1

Appeal from the C. A. 8th Cir. [Certiorari granted, 508 U. S. 971.]

2

Motion for appointment of counsel granted, and it is ordered that Richard H. Sindel, Esq., of Clayton, Mo., be appointed to serve as counsel for respondent in this case.
